Package com.caissemagasin.controller

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
com.caissemagasin.controller.OrderController
public class OrderController extends Object
Controller class to handle operations related to orders within the application. It bridges the interaction between models, views, and services.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderController

      public OrderController(OrderService orderService)
      Constructs an OrderController with a given order service.
      Parameters:
      orderService - Service to manage orders and related operations.

  • Method Details

    • initiateOrder

      public void initiateOrder(User user)
      Starts the order creation process for a given user. Allows the user to search for products, add them to an order, and finalize the order.
      Parameters:
      user - The user initiating the order (can be admin or regular user).

    • searchOrder

      public void searchOrder(User user)
      Allows the user to search for an existing order by its ID. Displays the details of the order if found.
      Parameters:
      user - The user performing the search (can be admin or regular user).

    • setOrderVue

      public void setOrderVue(OrderVue orderVue)
      Sets the view for order-related interactions.
      Parameters:
      orderVue - The view to use for displaying order-related information.

    • setDashboardAdminVue

      public void setDashboardAdminVue(DashboardAdminVue dashboardAdminVue)
      Sets the view for the admin dashboard.
      Parameters:
      dashboardAdminVue - The view to use for the admin dashboard.

    • setDashboardUserVue

      public void setDashboardUserVue(DashboardUserVue dashboardUserVue)
      Sets the view for the user dashboard.
      Parameters:
      dashboardUserVue - The view to use for the user dashboard.
